005package armyc2.c5isr.JavaTacticalRenderer;
006
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008
009import armyc2.c5isr.JavaLineArray.arraysupport;
010import armyc2.c5isr.JavaLineArray.ref;
011import armyc2.c5isr.JavaLineArray.POINT2;
012import armyc2.c5isr.JavaLineArray.TacticalLines;
013import armyc2.c5isr.JavaLineArray.CELineArray;
014import armyc2.c5isr.JavaLineArray.Shape2;
015import armyc2.c5isr.RenderMultipoints.clsRenderer2;
016import armyc2.c5isr.graphics2d.BasicStroke;
017import armyc2.c5isr.graphics2d.Rectangle2D;
018import armyc2.c5isr.renderer.utilities.Color;
019import armyc2.c5isr.renderer.utilities.EntityCode;
020import armyc2.c5isr.renderer.utilities.ErrorLogger;
021import armyc2.c5isr.renderer.utilities.IPointConversion;
022import armyc2.c5isr.renderer.utilities.RendererException;
023import armyc2.c5isr.JavaLineArray.Channels;
024import armyc2.c5isr.JavaLineArray.lineutility;
025import armyc2.c5isr.renderer.utilities.SymbolID;
026
027/**
028 * A class to process channel types.
029 *
030*
031 */
032public final class clsChannelUtility {
033
034    private static final String _className = "clsChannelUtility";
035
036    /**
037     * Gets partitions from the client points based on the segments generated by
038     * GetSegments. Partitions are used handle double-backed segments. Each
039     * partition is a continuous sequence of points for a channel.
040     *
041     * @param segments
042     * @param partitions OUT the partitions
043     * @return
044     */
045    private static int GetPartitions(boolean[] segments,
046            ArrayList<P1> partitions) {
047        try {
048            int j = 0;
049            boolean nextSegment = false;
050            //worst case is every segment is a separate partition
051            //caller must deallocate partitions
052            P1 p1 = new P1();
053            //first segment will always be true,
054            //there are no bad one-segment channels
055            if (segments[0] == false) {
056                return 0;
057            }
058
059            if (partitions != null) {
060                partitions.clear();
061            } else {
062                return 0;
063            }
064
065            p1.start = 0;
066            //only add the partitions after p1.end has been set
067            int n = segments.length;
068            //for (j = 0; j < segments.length - 1; j++) 
069            for (j = 0; j < n - 1; j++) {
070                nextSegment = segments[j + 1];
071                if (nextSegment == false) {
072                    //the end of the current partition is the last good segment
073                    p1.end_Renamed = j;
074                    partitions.add(p1);
075                    //beginning of the next partition
076                    p1 = new P1();
077                    p1.start = j + 1;
078                }
079            }
080            p1.end_Renamed = j;
081            partitions.add(p1);
082        } catch (Exception exc) {
083            //System.out.println(e.getMessage());
084            //clsUtility.WriteFile("error in clsChanneUtility.GetPartitions");
085            ErrorLogger.LogException(_className, "GetPartitions",
086                    new RendererException("Failed inside GetPartitions", exc));
087        }
088        return partitions.size();
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Draws a partition to the shapes array and stores the calculated channel
093     * points
094     *
095     * @param fromSegment
096     * @param toSegment
097     * @param pixels
098     * @param channelWidth
099     * @param bolLastSegment
100     * @param shapes
101     * @param channelPoints
102     * @param distanceToChannelPoint
103     * @return
104     */
105    private static int DrawGoodChannel2(TGLight tg,
106            int fromSegment,
107            int toSegment,
108            double[] pixels,
109            int channelWidth,
110            boolean bolLastSegment,
111            ArrayList<Shape2> shapes,
112            ArrayList<POINT2> channelPoints,
113            double distanceToChannelPoint) {
114        int returnValue = 0;    // Had to initialize to something
115        try {
116            int lineType = tg.get_LineType();
117            int lineType2;
118            double[] channelPixels = null;
119            switch (lineType) {
120                case TacticalLines.LC:
121                case TacticalLines.LC_HOSTILE:
122                case TacticalLines.UNSP:
123                case TacticalLines.DFENCE:
124                case TacticalLines.SFENCE:
125                case TacticalLines.DOUBLEA:
126                case TacticalLines.LWFENCE:
127                case TacticalLines.HWFENCE:
128                case TacticalLines.SINGLEC:
129                case TacticalLines.DOUBLEC:
130                case TacticalLines.TRIPLE:
131                    lineType2 = lineType;
132                    break;
133                case TacticalLines.SPT:
134                    if (fromSegment == 0) {
135                        lineType2 = TacticalLines.CHANNEL_FLARED;
136                    } else {
137                        lineType2 = TacticalLines.CHANNEL;
138                    }
139                    break;
140                case TacticalLines.MAIN:
141                    if (fromSegment == 0) {
142                        lineType2 = TacticalLines.CHANNEL_FLARED;
143                    } else {
144                        lineType2 = TacticalLines.CHANNEL;
145                    }
146                    break;
147                case TacticalLines.CATK:
148                    lineType2 = TacticalLines.CHANNEL_DASHED;
149                    break;
150                case TacticalLines.CATKBYFIRE:
151                    lineType2 = TacticalLines.CHANNEL_DASHED;
152                    break;
153                default:
154                    lineType2 = TacticalLines.CHANNEL;
155                    break;
156            }
157            if (bolLastSegment == true) {
158                if (fromSegment != 0) {
159                    switch (lineType) {
160                        case TacticalLines.SPT:
161                            lineType2 = TacticalLines.SPT_STRAIGHT;
162                            break;
163                        case TacticalLines.MAIN:
164                            lineType2 = TacticalLines.MAIN_STRAIGHT;
165                            break;
166                        default:
167                            lineType2 = (int) lineType;
168                            break;
169                    }
170                } else {
171                    lineType2 = (int) lineType;
172                }
173            }
174
175            if (fromSegment < 0) {
176                return returnValue;
177            }
178            if (toSegment < 0) {
179                return returnValue;
180            }
181            if (toSegment < fromSegment) {
182                return returnValue;
183            }
184            int j;
185            int lineCount;
186            int numPoints;
187            int counter;
188            double[] goodUpperPixels;
189            double[] goodLowerPixels;
190            numPoints = toSegment - fromSegment + 2;
191            goodUpperPixels = new double[2 * numPoints];
192            goodLowerPixels = new double[2 * numPoints];
193
194            counter = 0;
195            for (j = fromSegment; j < toSegment + 2; j++) {
196                goodUpperPixels[counter] = pixels[2 * j];
197                goodUpperPixels[counter + 1] = pixels[2 * j + 1];
198                goodLowerPixels[counter] = pixels[2 * j];
199                goodLowerPixels[counter + 1] = pixels[2 * j + 1];
200                counter = counter + 2;
201            }
202
203            tg.set_LineType(lineType2);
204            lineCount = CELineArray.CGetLineCountDouble(tg, goodUpperPixels, numPoints, channelWidth);
205            channelPixels = new double[3 * lineCount];
206            POINT2 pt = null;
207            lineCount = Channels.GetChannel1Double(tg, goodUpperPixels, goodLowerPixels, channelPixels, numPoints, numPoints, channelWidth / 2, (int) distanceToChannelPoint, shapes);
208            tg.set_LineType(lineType);
209
210            //if shapes is null then it is not a CPOF client
211            if (shapes == null && channelPixels != null) {
212                //do not clear channelPoints first because the function gets successive calls
213                int n = channelPixels.length;
214                //for (j = 0; j < channelPixels.length / 3; j++) 
215                for (j = 0; j < n / 3; j++) {
216                    pt = new POINT2(channelPixels[3 * j], channelPixels[3 * j + 1], (int) channelPixels[3 * j + 2]);
217                    if (j == channelPixels.length / 3 - 1) {
218                        pt.style = 5;
219                    }
220                    channelPoints.add(pt);
221                }
222            }
223
224            if (lineCount > 0) {
225                //DrawChannelPixels2(lineCount, channelPixels, (int)lineType);
226                returnValue = channelPixels.length;
227            } else {
228                returnValue = 0;
229            }
230            //channelPixels[channelPixels.length - 1] = 5;
231            if (lineCount > 0) {
232                channelPixels[lineCount - 1] = 5;
233            }
234            //clean up
235            goodUpperPixels = null;
236            goodLowerPixels = null;
237        } catch (Exception exc) {
238            //clsUtility.WriteFile("error in clsChanneUtility.DrawGoodChannel2");
239            ErrorLogger.LogException(_className, "DrawGoodChannel2",
240                    new RendererException("Failed inside DrawGoodChannel2", exc));
241        }
242        return returnValue;
243    }
244
245    /**
246     * Draws the channel partitions to the shapes array
247     *
248     * @param pixels
249     * @param partitions
250     * @param channelWidth channel width in pixels
251     * @param shapes
252     * @param channelPoints
253     * @param distanceToChannelPoint distance in pixels from the tip to the back
254     * of the arrow
255     */
256    private static void DrawSegments(TGLight tg,
257            double[] pixels,
258            ArrayList<P1> partitions,
259            int channelWidth,
260            ArrayList<Shape2> shapes,
261            ArrayList<POINT2> channelPoints,
262            double distanceToChannelPoint) {
263        try {
264            int j = 0;
265            int n = 0;
266            int t = partitions.size();
267            //for (j = 0; j < partitions.size() - 1; j++) 
268            for (j = 0; j < t - 1; j++) {
269                n = DrawGoodChannel2(tg, partitions.get(j).start, partitions.get(j).end_Renamed, pixels, channelWidth, false, shapes, channelPoints, distanceToChannelPoint);
270
271            }
272            //draw the last partition using linetype
273            n = DrawGoodChannel2(tg, partitions.get(j).start, partitions.get(j).end_Renamed, pixels, channelWidth, true, shapes, channelPoints, distanceToChannelPoint);
274        } catch (Exception exc) {
275            //clsUtility.WriteFile("error in clsChanneUtility.DrawSegments");
276            ErrorLogger.LogException(_className, "DrawSegments",
277                    new RendererException("Failed inside DrawSegments", exc));
278        }
279    }
280
281    private static void DrawLCSingleLineSegments(TGLight tg,
282                                                 double[] pixels2,
283                                                 ArrayList<P1> singleLinePartitions,
284                                                 ArrayList<Shape2> shapes,
285                                                 Rectangle2D clipBounds,
286                                                 IPointConversion converter) {
287        try {
288            for (P1 flotPartition : singleLinePartitions) {
289                int vblSaveCounter = flotPartition.end_Renamed - flotPartition.start + 1;
290                ArrayList<POINT2> flotPixels = new ArrayList<>();
291                for (int i = 0; i < vblSaveCounter; i++)
292                    flotPixels.add(new POINT2(pixels2[2 * (i + flotPartition.start)], pixels2[2 * (i + flotPartition.start) + 1]));
293
294                String flotID = tg.get_SymbolId();
295                flotID = SymbolID.setAffiliation(flotID, SymbolID.StandardIdentity_Affiliation_Hostile_Faker);
296                flotID = SymbolID.setEntityCode(flotID, EntityCode.EntityCode_FLOT);
297                TGLight flotTG = new TGLight();
298                flotTG.set_LineType(TacticalLines.FLOT);
299                flotTG.set_Pixels(flotPixels);
300                flotTG.set_SymbolId(flotID);
301                flotTG.set_LineThickness(tg.get_LineThickness());
302
303                ArrayList<Shape2> flotShapes = clsRenderer2.GetLineArray(flotTG, converter, false, clipBounds);
304
305                if (flotShapes != null) {
306                    for (Shape2 shape : flotShapes)
307                        shape.setLineColor(Color.RED);
308                    shapes.addAll(flotShapes);
309                }
310            }
311        } catch (Exception exc) {
312            ErrorLogger.LogException(_className, "DrawLCFlotSegments",
313                    new RendererException("Failed inside DrawLCFlotSegments", exc));
314        }
315    }
316
317    /**
318     * Handle symbol too small for line of contact
319     * @param tg
320     * @param pixels
321     * @return 
322     */
323    private static ArrayList<POINT2> getLCPixels(TGLight tg,ArrayList<POINT2>pixels)
324    {
325        ArrayList<POINT2>pixels2=null;
326        try
327        {
328            if(tg.get_LineType()!=TacticalLines.LC)
329                return pixels;
330            POINT2[] pts=tg.Pixels.toArray(new POINT2[pixels.size()]);
331            POINT2 ul=new POINT2(),lr=new POINT2();
332            lineutility.CalcMBRPoints((POINT2[])pts, pts.length, ul, lr);
333            double flotDiameter = arraysupport.getScaledSize(21, tg.get_LineThickness());
334            if(lr.x-ul.x>=flotDiameter)
335                return pixels;
336            else if (lr.y-ul.y>=flotDiameter)
337                return pixels;
338            //at this point the mbr is too small for a meaningful LC symbol
339            double x0=pts[0].x,y0=pts[0].y,x1=pts[1].x,y1=pts[1].y;
340            if (x0<=x1)            
341                x1=x0+flotDiameter;
342            else
343                x1=x0-flotDiameter;
344            y1=y0;
345            POINT2 pt0=new POINT2(x0,y0),pt1=new POINT2(x1,y1);
346            pixels2=new ArrayList();
347            pixels2.add(pt0);
348            pixels2.add(pt1);
349        }
350        catch (Exception exc) {
351            //clsUtility.WriteFile("error in clsChanneUtility.DrawSegments");
352               ErrorLogger.LogException(_className ,"getLCPixels",
353                    new RendererException("Failed inside getLCPixels", exc));
354        }    
355        return pixels2;
356    }
357
358    /**
359     * The main interface to clsChannelUtility calls DrawChannel2 after stuffing
360     * the points into an array of 2-tuples x,y
361     *
362     * @param pixels the client points
363     * @param linetype the line type
364     * @param tg the tactical graphic
365     * @param shapes
366     * @param channelPoints
367     */
368    public static void DrawChannel(ArrayList<POINT2> pixels,
369            int linetype,
370            TGLight tg,
371            ArrayList<Shape2> shapes,
372            ArrayList<POINT2> channelPoints,
373            Rectangle2D clipBounds,
374            IPointConversion converter) {
375        try {
376            pixels=getLCPixels(tg,pixels);
377            //we must do this because the rotary arrow tip now has to match the
378            //anchor point, i.e. the rotary feature can no longer stick out past the anchor point
379            //45 pixels shift here matches the 45 pixels shift for catkbyfire found in Channels.GetAXADDouble
380            lineutility.adjustCATKBYFIREControlPoint(linetype, pixels, 45);
381            if(tg.get_LineType()==TacticalLines.LC && tg.isHostile())
382                linetype=TacticalLines.LC_HOSTILE;
383            
384            int j = 0;
385            double[] pixels2 = new double[pixels.size() * 2];
386            int n = pixels.size();
387            //for (j = 0; j < pixels.size(); j++) 
388            for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
389                pixels2[2 * j] = pixels.get(j).x;
390                pixels2[2 * j + 1] = pixels.get(j).y;
391            }
392            DrawChannel2(pixels2, linetype, tg, shapes, channelPoints, clipBounds, converter);
393        } catch (Exception exc) {
394            //clsUtility.WriteFile("error in clsChanneUtility.DrawSegments");
395            ErrorLogger.LogException(_className, "DrawChannel",
396                    new RendererException("Failed inside DrawChannel", exc));
397        }
398    }
399
400    /**
401     * utility for clsMETOC to handle double-backed segments
402     *
403     * @param tg the tactical graphic object
404     */
405    public static ArrayList<P1> GetPartitions2(TGLight tg) {
406        ArrayList partitions = null;
407        try {
408            double[] pixels = new double[tg.Pixels.size() * 2];
409            int n = tg.Pixels.size();
410            //for(int j=0;j<tg.Pixels.size();j++)
411            for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
412                pixels[2 * j] = tg.Pixels.get(j).x;
413                pixels[2 * j + 1] = tg.Pixels.get(j).y;
414            }
415
416            boolean[] segments = new boolean[pixels.length / 2 - 1];
417            if (segments.length == 0) {
418                return null;
419            }
420
421            double factor = arraysupport.getScaledSize(3, tg.get_LineThickness());
422
423            clsUtility.GetSegments(pixels, segments, factor);
424            partitions = new ArrayList<P1>();
425            GetPartitions(segments, partitions);
426        } catch (Exception exc) {
427            ErrorLogger.LogException(_className, "GetPartitions2",
428                    new RendererException("Failed inside GetPartitions2", exc));
429        }
430        return partitions;
431    }
432
433    /**
434     * The main function for processing channel types. Gets segments, then gets
435     * partitions from the segments and then draws the partitions.
436     *
437     * @param pixels the client points as an array of 2-tuples x,y
438     * @param linetype the line type
439     * @param tg the tactical graphic object
440     * @param shapes
441     * @param channelPoints
442     */
443    private static void DrawChannel2(double[] pixels,
444            int linetype,
445            TGLight tg,
446            ArrayList<Shape2> shapes,
447            ArrayList<POINT2> channelPoints,
448            Rectangle2D clipBounds,
449            IPointConversion converter) {
450        try {
451            ref<double[]> distanceToChannelPoint = new ref();
452            int j = 0;
453            double[] pixels2 = null;
454            int channelWidth = 0;
455            ArrayList<P1> partitions = null;
456            int n = pixels.length;
457            int numPoints = 0;
458            //LC and others do not call clsUtility.ChannelWidth, but the
459            //value array still needs to be allocated or there is a
460            //null pointer exception in DrawGoodChannel2
461            distanceToChannelPoint.value = new double[1];
462            distanceToChannelPoint.value[0] = arraysupport.getScaledSize(20, tg.get_LineThickness());
463
464            switch (linetype) {
465                case TacticalLines.MAIN:
466                case TacticalLines.CATK:
467                case TacticalLines.CATKBYFIRE:
468                case TacticalLines.AIRAOA:
469                case TacticalLines.AAAAA:
470                case TacticalLines.SPT:
471                    clsUtility.ReorderPixels(pixels);
472                    numPoints = pixels.length / 2;
473
474                    if (numPoints < 3) {
475                        return;
476                    }
477                    //moved this to be prior to stuffing pixels2
478                    channelWidth = clsUtility.ChannelWidth(pixels, distanceToChannelPoint) / 2;
479                    //ValidateChannelPixels2(ref pixels, ref channelWidth, ref distanceToChannelPoint);
480
481                    numPoints = pixels.length / 2;
482                    pixels2 = new double[pixels.length - 2];
483
484                    for (j = 0; j < numPoints; j++) {
485                        if (j < numPoints - 1) {
486                            pixels2[2 * j] = pixels[2 * j];
487                            pixels2[2 * j + 1] = pixels[2 * j + 1];
488                        }
489                    }
490                    break;
491                case TacticalLines.LC:
492                case TacticalLines.LC_HOSTILE:
493                    channelWidth = (int) arraysupport.getScaledSize(40, tg.get_LineThickness());// was 20;
494                    pixels2 = new double[pixels.length];
495                    n = pixels.length;
496                    //for (j = 0; j < pixels.length; j++) 
497                    for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
498                        pixels2[j] = pixels[j];
499                    }
500                    break;
501                case TacticalLines.UNSP:
502                case TacticalLines.DFENCE:
503                case TacticalLines.SFENCE:
504                case TacticalLines.DOUBLEA:
505                case TacticalLines.LWFENCE:
506                case TacticalLines.HWFENCE:
507                case TacticalLines.SINGLEC:
508                case TacticalLines.DOUBLEC:
509                case TacticalLines.TRIPLE:
510                    tg.set_lineCap(BasicStroke.CAP_BUTT);
511                    channelWidth = (int) arraysupport.getScaledSize(30, tg.get_LineThickness());
512                    if (Channels.getShiftLines()) {
513                        channelWidth = (int) arraysupport.getScaledSize(60, tg.get_LineThickness());
514                    }
515                    pixels2 = new double[pixels.length];
516                    n = pixels.length;
517                    //for (j = 0; j < pixels.length; j++) 
518                    for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
519                        pixels2[j] = pixels[j];
520                    }
521                    break;
522                default:
523
524                    break;
525            }
526
527            //we require new partitions because pixels are dirty
528            boolean[] segments = new boolean[pixels2.length / 2 - 1];
529            if (segments.length == 0) {
530                return;
531            }
532
533            // Line of contact looks bad with small channel corners extending out
534            if (linetype == TacticalLines.LC || linetype == TacticalLines.LC_HOSTILE) {
535                partitions = new ArrayList<>();
536                ArrayList<P1> singleLinePartitions = new ArrayList<>();
537                clsUtility.GetLCPartitions(pixels2, arraysupport.getScaledSize(40, tg.get_LineThickness()), partitions, singleLinePartitions);
538                DrawSegments(tg, pixels2, partitions, channelWidth, shapes, channelPoints, distanceToChannelPoint.value[0]);
539
540                if (singleLinePartitions.size() > 0) {
541                    // Render any small angles that only have side (not channel) as FLOT
542                    DrawLCSingleLineSegments(tg, pixels2, singleLinePartitions, shapes, clipBounds, converter);
543                }
544            } else {
545                double factor = 3;
546
547                clsUtility.GetSegments(pixels2, segments, factor);
548                partitions = new ArrayList<>();
549                GetPartitions(segments, partitions);
550
551                DrawSegments(tg, pixels2, partitions, channelWidth, shapes, channelPoints, distanceToChannelPoint.value[0]);
552            }
553        } catch (Exception exc) {
554            ErrorLogger.LogException(_className, "DrawChannel2",
555                    new RendererException("Failed inside DrawChannel2", exc));
556        }
557    }
558}
